Upstart Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:UPST) Receives $220.55 Consensus Price Target from Analysts  
Posted by Max Byerly on Apr 9th, 2022  
     
  
Upstart logoUpstart Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ:UPST – Get Rating) has been given an average rating of “Buy” by the thirteen analysts that are currently covering the stock, Marketbeat Ratings reports. One equities research analyst has rated the stock with a sell recommendation, four have assigned a hold recommendation and seven have given a buy recommendation to the company. The average 12-month price objective among brokerages that have issued ratings on the stock in the last year is $213.83.
